author: jmason
msg: logs-to-c updated; now sorts rules by ranking, so higher-hitting rules are clustered for better cache hits when evolving

author: msquadrat
msg: Replaced fixplath.pl with build/preprocessor, a more flexible approach. Read
the heading comment in preprocessor for more infos. @@VARIABLES@@ are now
replaced in the rules files and the libs, too; no more manual update of
require_version :o) All rules files do now begin with a more or less similar
header, saying as much as "don't edit this file".

author: jmason
msg: libspamc cleanup function, from Michael Brown

author: jmason
msg: workaround for CPAN.pm VERSION brokenness; also libspamc fd leak, fix from Michael Brown; spamd REAPER no longer makes system calls inside sig handler; Theo's fixes to RPM; netbsd spamd script updated to use -H

author: jmason
msg: merged Michael Brown's libspamc-building specfile into HEAD; also libspamc fd leak, fix from same
